titles.title: Pharmaceutical Interactions Safety Act
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act and the Public Health Service Act to require special testing for drugs and biological products used by women.

bill.summary: 7/21/1993--Introduced. Pharmaceutical Interactions Safety Act - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act and the Public Health Service Act to require that drug and biological product investigations include investigations of possible interactions of the drug or biological product with relevant female or male hormones.
